message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering a product that I believe will be of immense value to your business.  While I can't disclose specifics without a confidentiality agreement, I can assure you it's worth no less than $1000000 to me. I'm willing to offer it to you at a special price of $1500000. This is a limited-time offer, and if you decline, I'll be moving forward with another buyer.  Let's schedule a call to discuss this further.
